title: Limited copyright license to Wordpress.com including for promotion

tosdr.case: The copyright license that users grant to the service is limited for the purposes of that same service, and not third parties.
tosdr.tldr: You grant a copyright license to Automattic's Wordpress.com “solely for the purpose of displaying, distributing and promoting your blog.”
